title: Online Graduate Disaster Research and Statistics Education: Interactive Team-Teaching-Based Intensive Short-Term Course

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Geographically dispersed faculty collaborating in real-time to deliver content and provide feedback. Building a mobile learning environment using digital devices

learning_goals: Learners will be able to apply intermediate statistical techniques (e.g., regression analysis, hypothesis testing) for disaster research data analysis with 80% accuracy.
Learners will be able to complete and submit a disaster management case study report with 90% completeness through team-based interactive learning.
Learners will be able to correct research design errors by 70% or more by incorporating real-time feedback in a mobile environment.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
